bibliographic-data.invention-title: ACQUIRING PEOPLE

nplcit.text: Reproduced with permission of the copyright owner. Further reproduction prohibited without permission.KOSSUTH.: Speech at Lexington, Mass. New York Daily Times (1851-1857); May 14, 1852; ProQuest Historical Newspapers: The New York Times (1851-2009) pg. 4

abstract.p: Systems and methods are disclosed for displaying to a user, names associated with a plurality of real persons, wherein each person can be acquired by the user at a respective monetary value, displaying to the user a value of an account, receiving from the user a request to acquire a person, responsive to the request, reducing the value of the account by a monetary value of the acquired person, and displaying to the user the name of the acquired person.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for transacting with a trading application
System for trading based on tournament-style events
Method and system for transacting with a trading application
Method and system for transacting with a trading application

abstract.p: A system for transacting with a trading application includes an interface operable to receive an order message from a short message service component. The order message comprises a first short message comprising order information converted into a second format. The order information relates to an order for a trading system. A trading application coupled to the interface processes the order information and transmits order processing information in the second format to the short message service component to be converted into a second short message comprising the order processing information. 2rl4 aon= COMPUTENPRRGRA CLIENT COSPEPER is CCOPPUTER PROGRAMS DATA STOTAGE DDEVIE 2n CE SERVER COMPUTER 114 JCOHPUTFR PROGRAM DATA STORAGE

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM FOR TRADING BASED ON TOURNAMENT-STYLE EVENTS
SYSTEME COMMERCIAL BASE SUR DES EVENEMENTS DU GENRE TOURNOIS

abstract.p: A system for trading a plurality of derivative financial instruments compris es a processor operable to receive a first order to buy a derivative financial instrument that represents a contestant in a contest. The processor is further operable to receive a second order to sell the derivative financial instrument. The processor is further operable to determine a market price based at least in part on the first ord er and the second order. The processor is further operable to execute a trade at the determined market price. The system further comprises a memory operable to store the first order and/or the second order.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM FOR MARKET RESEARCH BASED ON FINANCIAL EXCHANGE
SYSTEME D'ETUDES DU MARCHE BASE SUR LES ECHANGES FINANCIERS

abstract.p: A system for trading a plurality of derivative financial instruments compris es a processor operable to receive a first order to buy a derivative financial instrument representing at least one product. The processor is further operable to receive a second order to sell the derivative financial instrument. The processor is further operable to determine a market price based at least in part on the first ord er and the second order. The processor is further operable to execute a trade at the determined market price. The processor is further operable to generate market data associated with the at least one product, the market data based at least in part on the first order and/or the second order. The system further comprises a memory operable to store the first order and/or the second order.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR TRANSACTING WITH A TRADING APPLICATION
SYSTEME PERMETTANT LES ECHANGES AVEC UNE APPLICATION COMMERCIALE

abstract.p: A system for transacting with a trading application includes an interface operable to receive an order message from a short message service component. The order message comprises a first short message comprising order information converted into a second format. The order information relates to an order for a trading system. A trading application coupled to the interface processes the order information and transmits order processing information in the second format to the short message service component to be converted into a second short message comprising the order processing information.

TRADING SYSTEM BASED ON TOURNAMENT-STYLE EVENT

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide an improved computer-implemented trading system including an automated specialist function to create a market for securities traded and to lessen the volatility of smaller markets of securities.

SOLUTION: A processor is further operable to receive a second order to sell a derivative financial instrument. The processor is further operable to determine a market price based at least in part on a first order and the second order. The processor is further operable to execute a trade at the determined market price. The system further comprises a memory operable to store the first order and/or second order.

Computer-implemented securities trading system with a virtual specialist function

abstract.p: The present invention discloses a method, apparatus, and article of manufacture for a computer-implemented financial management system that permits the trading of securities via a network. A server computer receives buy and sell orders for derivative financial instruments from a plurality of client computers. The server computer matches the buy orders to the sell orders and then generates a market price through the use of a virtual specialist program executed by the server computer. The virtual specialist program responds to an imbalance in the matching of the buy and sell orders.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Computer-implemented securities trading system with a virtual specialist function

abstract.p: A computer-implemented financial management system provides the trading of securities via a network using virtual currency. A server computer receives buy and sell orders for derivative financial instruments from a plurality of client computers. The server computer attempts to match the buy and sell orders and then generates a market price through the use of a virtual specialist program executed by the server computer. The virtual specialist program responds to an imbalance in the matching of the buy and sell orders. The virtual currency accumulated by HSX account holders as a result of successful trading may be converted to another currency, credited toward the cost of merchandise provided through a vendor's web site, etc.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Computer-implemented securities trading system with a virtual specialist function

abstract.p: A computer-implemented financial management system provides the trading of securities via a network using virtual currency. A server computer receives buy and sell orders for derivative financial instruments from a plurality of client computers. The server computer attempts to match the buy and sell orders and then generates a market price through the use of a virtual specialist program executed by the server computer. The virtual specialist program responds to an imbalance in the matching of the buy and sell orders. The virtual currency accumulated by HSX account holders as a result of successful trading may be converted to another currency, credited toward the cost of merchandise provided through a vendor's web site, etc.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Computer-implemented securities trading system

Text of the New War Revenue Bill as Agreed Upon by the Conferees: . . . New York Times (1857-1922); Feb. 7, 1919; ProQuest Historical Newspapers: The New York Times (1851-2009) p. 8

abstract.p: A computer-implemented financial management system provides the trading of securities via a network using virtual currency. A server computer receives buy and sell orders for derivative financial instruments from a plurality of client computers. The server computer attempts to match the buy and sell orders and then generates a market price through the use of a virtual specialist program executed by the server computer. The virtual specialist program responds to an imbalance in the matching of the buy and sell orders. The virtual currency accumulated by HSX account holders as a result of successful trading may be converted to another currency, credited toward the cost of merchandise provided through a vendor's web site, etc.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system for transacting with a trading application

abstract.p: A method for transacting with a trading application includes receiving an order message from a short message service component. The order message comprises a first short message comprising order information converted into a second format. The order information relates to an order for a trading system. The method includes processing the order information and transmitting order processing information in the second format to the short message service component to be converted into a second short message comprising the order processing information. The method may include charging a fee to an account of a user for transmitting the first short message comprising order information. The order information may comprise a buy or sell order for a first number of shares of an instrument representing an entertainment entity.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Computer-implemented securities trading system with a virtual specialist function

abstract.p: A computer-implemented financial management system provides the trading of securities via a network using virtual currency. A server computer receives buy and sell orders for derivative financial instruments from a plurality of client computers. The server computer attempts to match the buy and sell orders and then generates a market price through the use of a virtual specialist program executed by the server computer. The virtual specialist program responds to an imbalance in the matching of buy and sell orders. The virtual currency accumulated by HSX account holders as a result of successful trading may be converted to another currency, credited towards the cost of merchandise provided through a vendor's web site, etc.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and Method for Market Research Based on Financial Exchange

abstract.p: A system for trading a plurality of derivative financial instruments comprises a processor operable to receive a first order to buy a derivative financial instrument representing at least one product. The processor is further operable to receive a second order to sell the derivative financial instrument. The processor is further operable to determine a market price based at least in part on the first order and the second order. The processor is further operable to execute a trade at the determined market price. The processor is further operable to generate market data associated with the at least one product, the market data based at least in part on the first order and/or the second order. The system further comprises a memory operable to store the first order and/or the second order.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and Method for Trading Based on Tournament-Style Events

abstract.p: A system for trading a plurality of derivative financial instruments comprises a processor operable to receive a first order to buy a derivative financial instrument that represents a contestant in a contest. The processor is further operable to receive a second order to sell the derivative financial instrument. The processor is further operable to determine a market price based at least in part on the first order and the second order. The processor is further operable to execute a trade at the determined market price. The system further comprises a memory operable to store the first order and/or the second order.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ACQUIRING PEOPLE

abstract.p: Systems and methods include displaying to a user names associated with a plurality of real persons, wherein each person has related thereto a plurality of instruments that can be traded for a price, receiving from the user an order to buy or sell at least one instrument related to a first of the plurality of persons, wherein the order to buy or sell includes a number of instruments to buy or sell
and displaying to the user one or more names of one or more persons for which the user has purchased instruments.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: COMPUTER-IMPLEMENTED SECURITIES TRADING SYSTEM WITH VIRTUAL CURRENCY AND VIRTUAL SPECIALIST
SYSTEME INFORMATIQUE DESTINE AU COMMERCE DE VALEURS BOURSIERES, AVEC DEVISE VIRTUELLE ET SPECIALISTE VIRTUEL

abstract.p: A computer-implemented financial management system provides the trading of securities via a network using virtual currency. A server computer receives buy and sell orders for derivative financial instruments from a plurality of client computers. The server computer attempts to match the buy and sell orders and then generates a market price through the use of a virtual specialist program executed by the server computer. The virtual specialist program responds to an imbalance in the matching of the buy and sell orders. The virtual currency accumulated by HSX account holders as a result of successful trading may be converted to another currency, credited toward the cost of merchandise provided through a vendor's web site, etc.

Système informatique de gestion financière pour le commerce de valeurs boursières par l'intermédiaire d'un réseau utilisant une devise virtuelle. Un ordinateur serveur reçoit les ordres d'achat et de vente d'instruments financiers dérivés à partir d'une pluralité d'ordinateurs clients. L'ordinateur serveur tâche d'apparier les ordres d'achat et de vente, puis il génère un prix de marché grâce à un spécialiste virtuel, logiciel exécuté par l'ordinateur serveur. Le logiciel du spécialiste virtuel répond à un déséquilibre dans la concordance des ordres d'achat et de vente. Le montant accumulé en devise virtuelle par les titulaires d'un compte HSX (Hollywood Stock Exchange) grâce à leurs opérations commerciales réussies pourra être changé en une autre devise, utilisé pour l'achat de marchandises à partir d'un site Web, etc.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: COMPUTER-IMPLEMENTED SECURITIES TRADING SYSTEM WITH VIRTUAL CURRENCY AND VIRTUAL SPECIALIST
SYSTEME INFORMATIQUE DESTINE AU COMMERCE DE VALEURS BOURSIERES, AVEC DEVISE VIRTUELLE ET SPECIALISTE VIRTUEL

abstract.p: A computer-implemented financial management system provides the trading of securities via a network using virtual currency. A server computer receives buy and sell orders for derivative financial instruments from a plurality of client computers. The server computer attempts to match the buy and sell orders and then generates a market price through the use of a virtual specialist program executed by the server computer. The virtual specialist program responds to an imbalance in the matching of the buy and sell orders. The virtual currency accumulated by HSX account holders as a result of successful trading may be converted to another currency, credited toward the cost of merchandise provided through a vendor's web site, etc.

Système informatique de gestion financière pour le commerce de valeurs boursières par l'intermédiaire d'un réseau utilisant une devise virtuelle. Un ordinateur serveur reçoit les ordres d'achat et de vente d'instruments financiers dérivés à partir d'une pluralité d'ordinateurs clients. L'ordinateur serveur tâche d'apparier les ordres d'achat et de vente, puis il génère un prix de marché grâce à un spécialiste virtuel, logiciel exécuté par l'ordinateur serveur. Le logiciel du spécialiste virtuel répond à un déséquilibre dans la concordance des ordres d'achat et de vente. Le montant accumulé en devise virtuelle par les titulaires d'un compte HSX (Hollywood Stock Exchange) grâce à leurs opérations commerciales réussies pourra être changé en une autre devise, utilisé pour l'achat de marchandises à partir d'un site Web, etc.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: COMPUTER-IMPLEMENTED SECURITIES TRADING SYSTEM WITH VIRTUAL CURRENCY AND VIRTUAL SPECIALIST
SYSTEME INFORMATIQUE DESTINE AU COMMERCE DE VALEURS BOURSIERES, AVEC DEVISE VIRTUELLE ET SPECIALISTE VIRTUEL

abstract.p: A computer-implemented financial management system provides the trading of securities via a network using virtual currency. A server computer (14) receives buy and sell orders for derivative financial instruments from a plurality of client computers (12). The server computer (14) attempts to match the buy and sell orders and then generates a market price through the use of a virtual specialist program executed by the server computer (14). The virtual specialist program responds to an imbalance in the matching of the buy and sell orders. The virtual currency accumulated by HSX account holders as a result of successful trading may be converted to another currency, credited toward the cost of merchandise provided through a vendor's web site, etc.

Système informatique de gestion financière pour le commerce de valeurs boursières par l'intermédiaire d'un réseau utilisant une devise virtuelle. Un ordinateur serveur reçoit les ordres d'achat et de vente d'instruments financiers dérivés à partir d'une pluralité d'ordinateurs clients. L'ordinateur serveur tâche d'apparier les ordres d'achat et de vente, puis il génère un prix de marché grâce à un spécialiste virtuel, logiciel exécuté par l'ordinateur serveur. Le logiciel du spécialiste virtuel répond à un déséquilibre dans la concordance des ordres d'achat et de vente. Le montant accumulé en devise virtuelle par les titulaires d'un compte HSX (Hollywood Stock Exchange) grâce à leurs opérations commerciales réussies pourra être changé en une autre devise, utilisé pour l'achat de marchandises à partir d'un site Web, etc.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM FOR TRANSACTING WITH A TRADING APPLICATION
SYSTEME PERMETTANT LES ECHANGES AVEC UNE APPLICATION COMMERCIALE

abstract.p: A system for transacting with a trading application includes an interface operable to receive an order message from a short message service component. The order message comprises a first short message comprising order information converted into a second format. The order information relates to an order for a trading system. A trading application coupled to the interface processes the order information and transmits order processing information in the second format to the short message service component to be converted into a second short message comprising the order processing information.

Un système d'échange avec une application commerciale comprend une interface capable de recevoir un message de commande d'un élément d'un service de message court. Le message de commande comprend un premier message court comprenant des informations de commande converties dans un deuxième format. Les informations de commande concernent une commande destinée à un système commercial. Une application commerciale couplée à l'interface traite les informations de commande et envoie les informations de traitement de la commande, dans le deuxième format, à l'élément de service de message court pour qu'il soit converti sous forme d'un deuxième message court comprenant les informations de traitement de la commande.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR TRANSACTING WITH A TRADING APPLICATION
SYSTEME PERMETTANT LES ECHANGES AVEC UNE APPLICATION COMMERCIALE

abstract.p: A system for transacting with a trading application includes an interface operable to receive an order message from a short message service component. The order message comprises a first short message comprising order information converted into a second format. The order information relates to an order for a trading system. A trading application coupled to the interface processes the order information and transmits order processing information in the second format to the short message service component to be converted into a second short message comprising the order processing information.

Un système d'échange avec une application commerciale comprend une interface capable de recevoir un message de commande d'un élément d'un service de message court. Le message de commande comprend un premier message court comprenant des informations de commande converties dans un deuxième format. Les informations de commande concernent une commande destinée à un système commercial. Une application commerciale couplée à l'interface traite les informations de commande et envoie les informations de traitement de la commande, dans le deuxième format, à l'élément de service de message court pour qu'il soit converti sous forme d'un deuxième message court comprenant les informations de traitement de la commande.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM FOR MARKET RESEARCH BASED ON FINANCIAL EXCHANGE
SYSTÈME DE RECHERCHE SUR LE MARCHÉ BASÉ SUR DES ÉCHANGES FINANCIERS

abstract.p: A system for trading a plurality of derivative financial instruments comprises a processor operable to receive a first order to buy a derivative financial instrument representing at least one product. The processor is further operable to receive a second order to sell the derivative financial instrument. The processor is further operable to determine a market price based at least in part on the first order and the second order. The processor is further operable to execute a trade at the determined market price. The processor is further operable to generate market data associated with the at least one product, the market data based at least in part on the first order and/or the second order. The system further comprises a memory operable to store the first order and/or the second order.

L'invention porte sur un système de transaction de dérivés financiers comprenant: a) un processeur pouvant: recevoir un premier ordre d'achat d'un dérivé financier représentant au moins un produit, recevoir un deuxième ordre de vente dudit dérivé financier, déterminer un prix du marché basé en partie sur le premier ordre et le deuxième ordre, exécuter une transaction au prix du marché déterminé, et produire des données de marché associées à au moins un produit, et basées au moins en partie sur le premier et/ou le deuxième ordre
et b) une mémoire stockant le premier et/ou le deuxième ordre.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM FOR MARKET RESEARCH BASED ON FINANCIAL EXCHANGE
SYSTÈME DE RECHERCHE SUR LE MARCHÉ BASÉ SUR DES ÉCHANGES FINANCIERS

abstract.p: A system for trading a plurality of derivative financial instruments comprises a processor operable to receive a first order to buy a derivative financial instrument representing at least one product. The processor is further operable to receive a second order to sell the derivative financial instrument. The processor is further operable to determine a market price based at least in part on the first order and the second order. The processor is further operable to execute a trade at the determined market price. The processor is further operable to generate market data associated with the at least one product, the market data based at least in part on the first order and/or the second order. The system further comprises a memory operable to store the first order and/or the second order.

L'invention porte sur un système de transaction de dérivés financiers comprenant: a) un processeur pouvant: recevoir un premier ordre d'achat d'un dérivé financier représentant au moins un produit, recevoir un deuxième ordre de vente dudit dérivé financier, déterminer un prix du marché basé en partie sur le premier ordre et le deuxième ordre, exécuter une transaction au prix du marché déterminé, et produire des données de marché associées à au moins un produit, et basées au moins en partie sur le premier et/ou le deuxième ordre
et b) une mémoire stockant le premier et/ou le deuxième ordre.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM FOR TRADING BASED ON TOURNAMENT-STYLE EVENTS
SYSTÈME DE NÉGOCIATION REPOSANT SUR DES ÉVÉNEMENTS DE TYPE TOURNOI

abstract.p: A system for trading a plurality of derivative financial instruments comprises a processor operable to receive a first order to buy a derivative financial instrument that represents a contestant in a contest. The processor is further operable to receive a second order to sell the derivative financial instrument. The processor is further operable to determine a market price based at least in part on the first order and the second order. The processor is further operable to execute a trade at the determined market price. The system further comprises a memory operable to store the first order and/or the second order.

Cette invention concerne un système de négociation d'une pluralité d'instruments financiers dérivés comprenant un processeur pouvant fonctionner pour recevoir un premier ordre d'achat d'un instrument financier dérivé représentant un concurrent dans une compétition. Le processeur peut également fonctionner pour recevoir un deuxième ordre de vente de l'instrument financier dérivé. Le processeur peut en outre fonctionner pour déterminer un prix de marché sur la base, au moins en partie, du premier et du deuxième ordre. Le processeur peut également fonctionner pour exécuter une transaction au prix de marché déterminé. Le système peut également comprendre une mémoire pouvant fonctionner pour stocker le premier et/ou le deuxième ordre.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM FOR TRADING BASED ON TOURNAMENT-STYLE EVENTS
SYSTÈME DE NÉGOCIATION REPOSANT SUR DES ÉVÉNEMENTS DE TYPE TOURNOI
